en-US.name: Vehicle Pack
en-US.summary: This gives you access to all of the vehicles in the Star Wars universe.
en-US.description: You can now ask about any of the vehicles you have seen in Star Wars.
examplePhrases: Alexa, give me the vehicle pack.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The vehicle pack gives you access to the huge number of vehicles in the Star Wars universe, including the Millennium Falcon, Slave One, and the Star Destroyer.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: You now own the vehicle pack.

testingInstructions: This is the instructions for testing.
